00001 #include <pthread.h>
00002 
00003 template <typename T> class wqueue
00004 { 
00005 
00006   public:
00007   wqueue() {
00008     pthread_mutex_init(&m_mutex, NULL);
00009     pthread_cond_init(&m_condv, NULL);
00010   }
00011 
00012   ~wqueue() {
00013     pthread_mutex_destroy(&m_mutex);
00014     pthread_cond_destroy(&m_condv);
00015   }
00016 
00017   void add(T item) {
00018     pthread_mutex_lock(&m_mutex);
00019     m_queue.push_back(item);
00020     pthread_cond_signal(&m_condv);
00021     pthread_mutex_unlock(&m_mutex);
00022   }
00023 
00024   T remove() {
00025     pthread_mutex_lock(&m_mutex);
00026     while (m_queue.size() == 0) {
00027       pthread_cond_wait(&m_condv, &m_mutex);
00028     }
00029     T item = m_queue.front();
00030     m_queue.pop_front();
00031     pthread_mutex_unlock(&m_mutex);
00032     return item;
00033   }
00034 
00035   int size() {
00036     pthread_mutex_lock(&m_mutex);
00037     int size = m_queue.size();
00038     pthread_mutex_unlock(&m_mutex);
00039     return size;
00040   }
00041 
00042   std::list<T>   m_queue;
00043   pthread_mutex_t m_mutex;
00044   pthread_cond_t  m_condv;
00045 
00046 };
00047 
00048 class SnowThread {
00049 
00050   public:
00051   SnowThread() : m_tid(0), m_running(0), m_detached(0) {}
00052   
00053   ~SnowThread()
00054   {
00055     if (m_running == 1 && m_detached == 0) {
00056       pthread_detach(m_tid);
00057     }
00058     if (m_running == 1) {
00059       pthread_cancel(m_tid);
00060     }
00061   }
00062 
00063   static void* runThread(void* arg)
00064   {
00065     return ((SnowThread*)arg)->run();
00066   }
00067  
00068   int start()
00069   {
00070     int result = pthread_create(&m_tid, NULL, runThread, this);
00071     if (result == 0) {
00072       m_running = 1;
00073     }
00074     return result;
00075   }
00076 
00077   int join()
00078   {
00079     int result = -1;
00080     if (m_running == 1) {
00081       result = pthread_join(m_tid, NULL);
00082       if (result == 0) {
00083         m_detached = 1;
00084       }
00085     }
00086     return result;
00087   }
00088  
00089   int detach()
00090   {
00091     int result = -1;
00092     if (m_running == 1 && m_detached == 0) {
00093       result = pthread_detach(m_tid);
00094       if (result == 0) {
00095         m_detached = 1;
00096       }
00097     }
00098     return result;
00099   }
00100 
00101   pthread_t self() {
00102     return m_tid;
00103   }
00104 
00105   virtual void* run() = 0;
00106  
00107 private:
00108   pthread_t  m_tid;
00109   int        m_running;
00110   int        m_detached;
00111 };
00112 
00113 template <class T>
00114   class ConsumerThread : public SnowThread {
00115  
00116 public:
00117 
00118   ConsumerThread(wqueue<T*>& queue, bool verbose) : m_queue(queue), m_verbose(verbose) {}
00119  
00120   void* run() {
00121     // Remove 1 item at a time and process it. Blocks if no items are 
00122     // available to process.
00123     for (int i = 0;; i++) {
00124       //if (m_verbose)
00125         //printf("thread %lu, loop %d - waiting for item...\n", 
00126         //     (long unsigned int)self(), i);
00127       T* item = (T*)m_queue.remove();
00128       item->run();
00129       //m_output->push_back(item->output());
00130       delete item;
00131       if (m_queue.size() == 0)
00132         return NULL;
00133     }
00134     return NULL;
00135   }
00136 
00137   //std::vector<O*> getThreadOutput() {return m_output;}
00138 
00139  private: 
00140   wqueue<T*>& m_queue;
00141   bool m_verbose;
00142 
00143 };
